title: ‘It’s Going to Be a Very Nice Fight’: San Remo Women Opens Ambitious 2025 Season for Lotte Kopecky
content:
World champion will make Tour de France GC a key objective for first time in her career without losing focus on classics: 'We are curious how far we can go.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s Going to Be a Very Nice Fight’: San Remo Women Opens Ambitious 2025 Season for Lotte Kopecky on Velo.
author: sstokes
